description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill.  Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time.  Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city while you craft items, find supplies and learn new skills.
